text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Herman Cain is dead from the coronavirus because he was one of your ignorant, gullible Trump cult minions who wouldn’t wear a mask because you said they weren’t necessary. But you go on. Try to ignore it and endorse another cult minion’s pizza instead.
